split

public java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String string)
Split the string on query terms such that result[EVEN] hold string text around consecutive query terms and result[ODD} hold string text matching this query's query terms.

split in interface TopicSplitter

setHighlightLeft

public void setHighlightLeft(java.lang.String highlightLeft)
Set the string to add to the left of query terms for highlighting.

If undefined, '*' will be used.

setHighlightRight

Set the string to add to the right of query terms for highlighting.

If undefined, '*' will be used.

highlightString

public java.lang.String highlightString(java.lang.String string)
Highlight query terms in the string.

Use the values of highlight-Left and -Right or '*' to highlight.
